com.metaio.tools
Class Layout

java.lang.Object
  com.metaio.tools.Layout

public final class Layout
extends java.lang.Object

The class provide some helper methods to determine the layout parameters

Method Detail

getLayoutParams

public static android.widget.FrameLayout.LayoutParams getLayoutParams(android.content.Context context,
                                                                      Vector2di viewSize,
                                                                      boolean fullScreen)
Get the layout parameters to best fit the view in full screen. This method assumes that the Activity is in landscape mode.

Parameters:
context - Activity context
viewSize - View's original size with correct aspect
fullScreen - Stretch to full screen if true, else stretch to best fit keeping the aspect ratio
Returns:
LayoutParams that can be applied to the view
See Also:
Layout#getLayoutParams(Vector2di, boolean, boolean)

getLayoutParams

public static android.widget.FrameLayout.LayoutParams getLayoutParams(android.content.Context context,
                                                                      Vector2di viewSize,
                                                                      boolean fullScreen,
                                                                      boolean portrait)
Get the layout parameters to best fit the view in full screen given the screen orientation.

Parameters:
context - Activity context
viewSize - View's original size with correct aspect
fullScreen - Stretch to full screen if true, else stretch to best fit keeping the aspect ratio
portrait - if the Activity is in portrait orientation
Returns:
LayoutParams that can be applies to the view

getLayoutParams

public static android.widget.FrameLayout.LayoutParams getLayoutParams(android.content.Context context,
                                                                      Vector2di viewSize,
                                                                      android.graphics.Rect visibleFrame,
                                                                      boolean fullView)
Get the layout parameters to best fit the view in the given view's frame. This method assumes that Activity is in landscape mode.

Parameters:
context - Activity context
viewSize - View's original size with correct aspect
visibleFrame - Visible window frame in which this view should fit in
fullView - true to fill entire parent view, false to best fit
Returns:
LayoutParams that can be applied to the view

getLayoutParams

public static android.widget.FrameLayout.LayoutParams getLayoutParams(android.content.Context context,
                                                                      Vector2di viewSize,
                                                                      android.graphics.Rect visibleFrame,
                                                                      boolean fullView,
                                                                      boolean portrait)
Get the layout parameters to best fit the view in the given view's frame and the screen orientation.

Parameters:
context - Activity context
viewSize - View's original size with correct aspect
visibleFrame - Visible window frame in which this view should fit in
fullView - true to fill entire parent view, false to best fit
portrait - true if the Activity is in portrait orientation
Returns:
LayoutParams
